reviewText:
This Movie Sucked!

Worst Script, Worst Camera work, Worst Direction.

Im still trying to figure out what the American guy was doing in the film following the asian grl around.

I don't know whats dumber, this film or me for buying it.

Can you rate for less than a 1? I agree with T, this is a waste of money, mine in particular. I will definitely read more of the reviews from now on. Waste of time waste of money, very bad title, very misleading.

I just wasted my money and time on this bored movie, there is no sex, I wanted to watch asian girls having sex, there are like 3 naked scenes where they are just rubbing their bodies, I'd like to get a refund

I liked the movie pleasure factory. it was interesting it was done in documentary style and  it was almost like the people in it were not acting. it seemed like real life. the movie  goes through different young singapore pleasure seekers looking for fun and sex in singapores red light district. all the people are very young in the movie, high school to college age. i thought the movie pleasure factory was good and well acted. like the young guy so very shy the first time he had sex with a woman was very natural. I liked this 18 year old young man so shy at having sex trying to stall showing the prostitute all his different condoms and the lady playing the prostitute with him the best out of all the couples in the movie but the whole movie was fascinating. you may want to try it out.i liked it!
